VII.i.4.A.3.b
.
Determining When an Administrative Decision Is Required
The preparation of an administrative decision is required if
an individual’s status as a foster parent is denied
the authorization activity determines a Veteran’s biological or adoptive parent abandoned the Veteran, or
contested claims procedures apply.
References
:  For more information on
foster parents, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 4.A.6
the abandonment of a Veteran by a parent, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 4.A.8
, and
contested claims, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, 3.A
.
